ygData.subject: Re: specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: NO NO, your skill doesn t go down. You can have more then one Specialization si all, but only ONE specialization can be raised above 50. This doesn t effect
ygData.messageBody:
NO NO, your skill doesn't go down. You can have more then one
Specialization si all, but only ONE specialization can be raised above
50. This doesn't effect the skill itself.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 10:13 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] specialization
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> well, considering all my discliplines except conjuration are around
> 110,
> i'll miss that =P. and trust me, when you hit lvl 20, you want your
> conjuraion to be higher than 50, you fiz a LOT if it's low when trying
> to
> cast the lvl 20 pet... at least, i do =)
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on
> Cazic-Thule
>
> >They can't go any higher than 50 I think. Its not exactly like your
> >crippled though.
> >Having a 50 in other areas I would hope will definatly help you.
> >
> >Its just that you can't be a master of many disciplines, just one.
> >
> >Azboklin
